title: 596. Average Age of Position Groups + Caleb Farley on His Game
itunes:title: 596. Average Age of Position Groups + Caleb Farley on His Game
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a special new episode. To start off, the guys react to the Washington Football Team benching QB Dwayne Haskins (2:04). After that, the pair look at the average age of position groups and after, go into more detail on the topic (14:11). Then, the duo respond to a portion of a past interview with Dodgers manager Dave Roberts on coming back after a disappointing season (22:41). To wrap up the show, Virginia Tech CB Caleb Farley joins to discuss his decision to opt out of the college football season, he recalls plays vs. Miami from the 2019 season, picks which CB he wants to play like and talks about what he's been working on as he prepares for the draft (28:15).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
